title: Japan vs Scotland LIVE score: TV channel and Rugby World Cup 2019 live stream
text:
Japan vs Scotland has beaten Typhoon Hagibis and will go ahead in Yokohama today.

World Cup chiefs have given the game the green light meaning Scotland's destiny is very much in their own hands.

In simple terms, they need to claim four more points than the tournament hosts to progress to the knockout stages, but will crash out if they win without a bonus point and Japan lose by less than seven.

If the game ends in a draw or a Japanese victory, Scotland will be out regardless.

Follow all the action LIVE right here.

Japan: Tupou, Matsushima, Lafaele, Nakamura, Fukuoka, Tamura, Nagare, Inagaki, Horie, Koo, Thompson, Moore, Leitch, Labuschagne, Himeno

Scotland: Hogg, Seymour, Harris, Johnson, Graham, Russell, Laidlaw, Dell, Brown, Nel, Gilchrist, Gray, Bradbury, Ritchie, Thomson

The match is live on ITV and can be live streamed via the ITV Player.
description: Scotland know they must claim victory in Yokohama to stand any chance of progressing to the knockout stages
